name: rpad.
body:
rpad is a browser based document editor that allows embedding and running R code directly in the document. Any output that R produces is nicely formatted and placed below the code. rpad aims to be feature slim and allow you to produce beautiful documents without getting in the way.

[![screenshot](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/5869437/3456234/7fc06536-01ec-11e4-806d-a9f0dc143626.png)](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/5869437/3456234/7fc06536-01ec-11e4-806d-a9f0dc143626.png)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
